website_summaries.verdict: Affordable Sharpie-friendly high-quality board for multiple uses.
pros: Reviews note the board's ability to mount well on multiple surfaces
Works as a dry erase board as well
Comes with thorough instructions in terms of setup and usage

customer_reviews.title: Board and Template were fine.
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to popular belief the template was so accurate (If done correctly) that I was able to line two boards up PERFECTLY side by side. The board was of good quality. So far I've written on it with Sharpie, and liquid ink and it has performed to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chezburt Carter

customer_reviews.title: Look good, installs good, erases good. It’s good.
customer_reviews.text: I literally installed this by pushing my Phillips head screw driver through the drywall to make the mounting holes. If an idiot without a drill like me can get this thing mounted and level, you’ll be fine. You can do it. I believe in you. Looks smashing. Hardware is sturdy. Frosted glass didn’t scratch or flake when I installed the marker holder incorrectly and had to move it. Ballin’.
customer_reviews.author: CubicleGangster

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than a regular white board
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, hardware very nice, easy instructions, heavy glass, great price, love it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Lee

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Board
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glass whiteboard. I was happy to find that this whiteboard wasn't $200 like some of the others. I bought it used - like new, so I got around $10 off. Even at regular price, it is so worth it. The board is very good glass, and it looks very modern, not to mention great on my wall. Installation was a bit annoying in the beginning, but once we figured it out, we got it in the wall no problem. Very good product, only thing to note is that some colors of regular marker don't show up very well, most likely due to it being glass, but I can still read it well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Love this...
customer_reviews.text: This glass board is much easier to clean than any white board and looks also much better than a flat white board. Went for the all glass see through version and I am loving it. Looks classy and expensive. No more marker residue on the board and if you want to really clean it you can simply use Windex. Bought special glass markers for it, even though I think that regular white board markers might work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy! Nice looking, needs two people to mount, would be hesitant to put into drywall.
customer_reviews.text: There's a piece of paper that is included that you're supposed to use as a template for the drilling of the mounts. I was drilling into solid wood walls so used a marker through the holes of the glass to drill the holes. Still needed to adjust 2 of the holding mounts (there is not a lot of slop in the mounting). If you're going into drywall take your time or you'll end up with a messy result. I'd plan on using 2 people regardless of method as the glass is heavy. The US post office wouldn't deliver without a signature because of the heft of the glass, not a problem but it delayed delivery a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen a lot of concerns with the template...which you make yourself. It looks like some people hold the board up on the wall to make marks for holes (what?). I taped the poster to the glass board on the ground, put a couple pieces of tape on, and marked the holes. Once the poster was taped on the wall I leveled it according to the holes, which was probably the most tedious part, and drilled into the marks. In total, it took about 20 minutes and is perfectly level. I guess my advice would be to not overthink it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to clean, I bought the white glass. Will not erase all the way and you can still see what I had previously wrote even after I “erased” it. I tried the cleaner and it still does not come off. Pretty upsetting because I bought the glass type thinking this would not have happened, I should’ve just bought a regular one if I would’ve known.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie marquez

customer_reviews.title: I shouldn't have waited so long
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine on the wall today. Ordered the clear 35.5" x 47.5". I've been researching these forever. Will it look good? Will it mount on just the sheet rock? Will it flex when I write on it? blah blah. This passed all of my tests. It mounts perfectly with the included anchors and I can't imagine it pulling out. Clear board is reflective, and shows every fingerprint, but cleans easily with glass cleaner. Looks just like I wanted it to and works really well. The hardest part was overcoming my skepticism, which I finally did. Now I have it in my office and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Heim

customer_reviews.title: Very slick and modern
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board. Install was a little tricky since our wall isn’t perfectly flat (this could be why some struggle). One BIG caveat-regular dry erase pens SUCK on this board (we have the frosted version). It’s really hard to see all but a few colors. How much lite hits the board is critical on how easy it is to see (something to keep in mind). We have ceiling cans and of course none happen to be illuminating the wall we installed on. We have some special pens on order, but ultimately may have to install additional light in order to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and cute
customer_reviews.text: Using this in craft room. It is cute, modern and get compliments on it all the time. It is NOT easy to hang with one person, lol. Also, would definitely recommend getting the glass board markers to use with this, the whiteboard markers don't show up well at all. It is a beautiful piece, sits about an inch from the wall when hung. Love it and thinking of getting the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular white board that was starting to "ghost" and I accidentally scratched off some of it. So far this board has been amazing. It sits slightly off the wall and was relatively easy to install, even with one person. It can be a pain to get the bolts to line up even with the template, but such is installing things. This board clean easily and looks so much more professional. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: robbclark1

customer_reviews.title: It's indestructible and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The idiot UPS driver for my route dropped the package over the fence and it survived without even a scratch. It's definitely tempered glass. It came with a template too which made installation extremely easy, only taking ~20 minutes. The quality of the standoffs looks to be solid, and the product itself looks and feels fantastic. Compared to many other available glass dry erase boards on Amazon, this one is a fantastic value for the price. For this listing, the best valued size mathematically is the 35.5 x 47.25.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The board is fantastic. The shipping situation is not.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered three of these now, but only one has made it to the wall intact. UPS obliterated the other two. If you find the board is ghosting or hard to erase, take it down and flip it over. It's easier to make this mistake than you might think and the product could probably use a cheap sticker that says "front" in large letters for the impatient like me. Also, it really does need more foam padding in the box for shipping -- maybe closer to how a television is packed. The current packaging is not up to surviving the moonlighting baggage handlers that work for UPS in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lent

customer_reviews.title: Like it. But could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Like the frosted board .. having installed myself with little help from my 13 yr old we installed it on less than 30 mins. Few improvements could be to get the holes pre- marked on the template by the manufacturer would help immensely as any wrong hole on the wall would a) not fit the board and b) will have ugly walls. I did notice some white spots on the board which doesn't look like either on front or back of the board. Some thing while the board was frosted. Attached pic.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and very attractive. And erases 100%--no ghost images. The only thing to note is that the glass makes the lines less bold and creates a small shadow beneath all of the markings. This is fine by me, and actually looks pretty cool. The only downside is that, when you take a photo of what you've got up on the board, the lines appear a little blurry because of the shadow. But it's very slight and does not interfere with my use or enjoyment of this board.
customer_reviews.author: KPW

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek, but writing doesn't show well
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and look of this board. Installation was quite easy for my husband and he did it alone. We used our own drywall anchors per the other reviews as the ones provided don't seem great. My only issue is that the writing doesn't show very clearly on this board (and I bought new markers too and tried all colors). Not sure there is any fix for this?
customer_reviews.author: Nushin Alloo

customer_reviews.title: Writing on the frosted side
customer_reviews.text: I have overhead light which was causing ghosting with the glass side forward (as there is a gap between the glass and the frosting). Flipped the board and write on the frosted side- traditional whiteboard markers work MUCH better this way and there are no ghosting issues. It does not erase quite as well, although no worse than a regular whiteboard. The template was a bit bent in delivery- still worked but the posts are a bit out of alignment (you'd have to look to notice). Also, the board has more flex than I expected (e.g. when erasing)- not a big deal but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and effective
customer_reviews.text: The frosted glass with the metal spacers looks great. The glass surface makes cleaning this dry-erase board super easy. The tray for holding dry-erase pens attaches easily and securely. Not sure I could ask for anything more on a product such as this. Also, when I was installing the board, I thought it had shipped with one of the corner assemblages missing. Turns out my pup took it to his treasure hoard. I only found it after I has requested a replacement form the manufacturer, which they sent out immediately via priority mail. Good product. Good company.
customer_reviews.author: Bukkene Bruse

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first one, I bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished buying and installing my second one of these boards. The only thing you miss with this the magnetic surface to stick dry-erase markers.. but it doesn't stain easy, and just works! Love these boards.. I'd get the next size up, but I am cheap at times and the mid-size is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Fugetabutit

customer_reviews.title: So pretty in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a whiteboard to write grocery lists, chore lists, etc. but we didn't want a tacky whiteboard hanging in our pretty kitchen. This sort of just blends into the wall! I sprayed the silver metal wall-fasteners with a metallic copper finish to match our kitchen appliances and hardware. It looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. Bought 30 of these for the office.
customer_reviews.author: JL Miller

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical on purchasing a big dry erase board but let me tell you I am more than happy! Exactly what I wanted!!! Its very sturdy and strong. I use it for my science classes so it gets a lot of markings on it. Ive tried walmart and dollar store dry erase markers- they clean easily. I wish I would have purchased a much bigger one to be honest (I bought the 23 x 35). Later on, I may purchase a bigger one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cmeza

customer_reviews.title: No ghosting!
customer_reviews.text: What a killer good product! For the reviews that said it didn't show well on the "glass side" I COMPLETELY DISAGREE. **I got the one with the frost behind it. I didn't hang it yet because I wanted to test the glass side of this first. I am so thrilled with it. The reason I needed this was to avoid GHOSTING. I am in financial services and use a board daily in my presentations. It is a very high traffic board. It is elegant and professional. The biggest concern for me was the ghosting as that looks terrible. As long as this mounts as easy as it looks...I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Grimes

customer_reviews.title: White glass dry-erase board was exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The board came well packaged and in perfect condition with all parts to install board on the wall. The installation video found on line helped. By closely following the instructions the installation went without any problems. The board is very professional looking and functions well for a dry erase board. I have only tried dry erase markers on the board so far, but they do the job and erase with ease. I liked that this size board required six anchors instead of some brands that only had four.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: White Board Old School, Glass Board New School
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something that looks a little nicer than the old fashion white board this is it. We did the clear one, which means you can definitely see the wall behind it. Which is our case is a nice green color so it's almost like the glass board simply fades away.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: difficult to mount unless your good at making holes in the perfect place
customer_reviews.text: difficult to mount unless your good at making holes in the perfect place. must have two people to mount. i wish i would have ordered the frosted glass because the wall i mounted it on was creme white and the colors are very visible. (green and red are the least visible, black being the most visible) other than that...its hard to review a flat piece of glass.
customer_reviews.author: alex w.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install/Good hardware
customer_reviews.text: The install template is fantastic and made the the whole process easy. The hardware is good. Compared to Quartet, the hardware (anchors, screws, template, tray) with this brand is way better. The board looks great and has changed the way I work from home.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I love this board
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this board. Easy to install, very easy to clean and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking, easy to install....
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a whiteboard in the home office that didn't look 'so commerical'. This item fit the bill perfectly. Installation was a snap... used the template, painters tape, and a level... drilled the holes, placed the anchors... and it was perfect. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joe Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed to find the glass had been chipped in one ...
customer_reviews.text: Just finished setting up my new office and was anxiously awaiting the final piece - the glass dry-erase board. I was very disappointed to find the glass had been chipped in one of the corners. It took a week to arrive so at this point I'm debating just living with it or returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Pena

customer_reviews.title: It's Not Frosted...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the frosted version, it was packaged very well. However, this is not a true frosted glass, it is clear glass with a laminated opaque vinyl on the back making it to appear frosted (simulated frosted). My unit arrived with numerous bubbles with small pieces of lint and specks everywhere on the board. Also had a scratch in the writing surface near the top middle mounting hole that marker would stay in and not come out. Please revise this listing to reflect that this is NOT ACTUAL FROSTED GLASS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Prince

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: In love! Packaging came in tact - instructions were super clear. Came with a template for the holes. Honestly this was the easiest install I have ever had. But this. It's so gorgeous (Btw I got the frosted glass option. Not the white as I read that the white backing comes super super white)
customer_reviews.author: PartyOnTheEdge

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Clean and more contemporary on the wall of my brand new rehabbed white on white office space. I dig it. Easy to clean. Read reviews about the tray falling off. I am definitely not experiencing this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Badvhlad

customer_reviews.title: Lots of attention and complements - requires spray to clean almost everytime
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look in the office, very professional - Dry erase markers tend to streak and still show when just wiped with a standard eraser, requires spray like windex or dry erase cleaner to fully remove.
customer_reviews.author: William Potthoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but one recommendation to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Only question to the manufacturer would be why would you not have the holes drawn out on the template ahead of time instead of relying the customer to trace the holes onto the template?
customer_reviews.author: Hiep L.

customer_reviews.title: Needs two people to install - any bigger and we would have needed three
customer_reviews.text: Love it - I was nervous while my husband and son installed it - but it was quick and easy - I chose not to use the market tray because it would have been eye level with my son at his desk. But it is great and my son loves it for his physics homework!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nori

customer_reviews.title: Its great looking and installation was quick
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a backsplash for a oven. Its great looking and installation was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Looks stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my husband LOVES this large dry erase board! It looks stunning in his office! Expensive but totally worth it. Looks incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Anne D.

customer_reviews.title: ... up on a brick wall and it turned out awesome. Installation was pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to hang this up on a brick wall and it turned out awesome. Installation was pretty easy. The holes where you drive the screws in it could be a little bit bigger to accommodate most drills. Writing is super smooth and it is very very secure
customer_reviews.author: Kade Hansen

customer_reviews.title: No complaints! Very trendy and modern looking. Not ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! Very trendy and modern looking. Not difficult to put up if you use the template! Just make sure 1) the template is as flat as possible when taped on the wall, and 2) drill those screws tight into the anchors, this board is heavier than a plastic whiteboard, and 3) clean both sides of the board before hanging up, or youll have a finished board that has fingerprints all over the back.
customer_reviews.author: Sidhant Karamchandani

customer_reviews.title: Best install. Secure mounts
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this glass mounted dry erase. Super easy install. Mounts are very secure. I've had to install other brands so I've discovered that the mounts provide are very important.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't actually come with a marker tray.
customer_reviews.text: So far the board is decent. Installation wasn't super simple, but I expected that. There is no tray in the box. I'm a bit bummed about that, but it was a "warehouse" deal, so expectations were low to start with. While the box had extensive damage, the board itself was surprisingly ok.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Kramer

customer_reviews.title: White board utility with a more elegant presentation
customer_reviews.text: I am a psychologist, and I mounted this frosted glass dry erase board in my office, as I like to sketch out ideas that make assist my clients in understanding concepts. I like the modern feel of how it looks, and my clients have indicated that it looks good in the office.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: USE CARDBOARD TO MARK HOLES FOR WALL PLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whiteboard, easy install, looks very professional. quartet markers work a lot better on this board. My opinion if I could go back in time go with the ULTRA white glass boards. My coworker got the ultra white and I wish I would’ve purchased that one instead, but this is still a great glass white board, you can still see the markers well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: It is a great looking whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Our board is installed where everyone can see it. We get lots of compliments. It is a great looking whiteboard. It was also very easy to install. Even for someone like that myself that doesn't do a whole lot of work with my hands. It was very straight forward. I also have one of their 24"x36" boards that will be installed in my office. These are great products at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Love mine!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my home office. The installation was super easy and the board is solid and really nice looking. The marker tray is adequate and is firmly affixed by a pinching method (works fine). All in all a very nice board.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glass board
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews, I thought the installation could be a little bit cumbersome due to incorrect template. Surprisingly, it was perfect and very easy to hang on the wall. What it requires is a laser level which capture one right angle on the corner from one of the sides, and the rest becomes very easy. However, it does requires two people for the installation due to its size (36 X 59). It takes about 40 minutes from start to finish. The only downside is that the glass seems to be a little bit thin. The overall quality is great, a five stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Looks Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this glass board. It looks so much better than a typical white board and it's made my home office really look professional. Even my boss fell in love with it in our last video call. It will take 2 people to put up but it's very easy and very secure. There's no bubbling in the middle, it's sleek and easy to clean too. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: RSF

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy inatall
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality, I’ve gotten several nice comments since installing two of them in my office. Installation is pretty easy and straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: MrLaggy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this glass whiteboard however when I opened it the white coating on the back of the glass was scraped off in a small area. I’d already thrown out the box so couldn’t return it and had to use some whiteout to help it not look bad when I use it with clients. So consider not getting the white opaque version if you want to avoid this or double check it before you throw out the box. If this hadn’t happened I’d give it 5 stars and encouraging everyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Speer

customer_reviews.title: Great touch to my room! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! I’m not a tv person so I added a board in my room instead to save paper and other reasons but I am soooo in love with it. It was easy to instal, I used a black decker drill-20v :)
customer_reviews.author: Rose S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful glass board
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product and easy to set up. They have everything you need in the box! I love when a product works just like they say.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Faye

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this board. Extremly professional looking. It is very heavy. I think at least one of the six screws needs to be in a stud. You should also have someone help you hang it.....again, it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, the largest for my office and the medium for my home. These are faaaabbullloouusss. As fabulous as office products can go anyways. Since they are clear, I can wipe them off when guests come and you don't have the blank big white space sticking out like a sore thumb. The effect in the office is cleaner and modern. At home, it reminds my busy family what we need to do! Great product and goes up pretty effortlessly with a couple of people.
customer_reviews.author: Scout Mama

customer_reviews.title: It works for my objectives.
customer_reviews.text: The product is what I was looking for. I had a small issue with mine, I reached out and the company was great at making sure everything was made right. Good product, good company.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I got this dry erase board in frosted glass and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this dry erase board in frosted glass and in the largest size. I'm a biology major so it's been extremely helpful! The only thing is that expo markers don't work as well this frosted glass boards. I'm not sure if its the same for the opaque and clear, but if you get the frosted glass, be sure to get the quartet markers instead of expo!
customer_reviews.author: Winna

customer_reviews.title: Nice, hard to install
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice. The first one arrived so broken, I thought they forgot to send it to the glass factory, and sent me the raw material instead. But, I got a replacement very quickly. Note that this is NOT for the faint of heart to install.
customer_reviews.author: Gman518

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic board and a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic board and a great value for the money. My only challenge is that the background is not "white" so much as a dull grey. I especially noticed it when I bought a smaller glass whiteboard from U Glass which is truly white and I like the true white background a lot more. It's not a deal-breaker, just something to consider. Still a helpful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in perfect condition with all necessary hardware to mount. We will be using this as a glass wall with our company logo in our front lobby.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Professional look, does not make room ugly
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My biggest qualm with white boards is they're stark contrast on my walls and with the markers. This board is perfect for my aesthetic and functional needs. It looks really good on my wall and was a simple installation. I use it on a regular based and white boards markers do not leave a residue when erased. You do need a second set of hands to install the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board, 30 seconds of terror during the installation
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! I will say as someone who is not handy with tools, you should know you will need a Phillips head screwdriver . My IKEA screwdriver 10 in 1 was too wide to fit. I thought I was pretty accurate when marking the holes on the transfer paper, but it was a stressful 30 second installation when I finally got the glass up on the bolts. Luckily, I slammed it through the bolts and the glass didn't break and it all worked out lol, but be sure of you're markings!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: The board itself is beautiful. I found it very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is beautiful. I found it very easy to install, but you do need a long screw driver as a 10 in 1 screwdriver is too thick to fit through the holes in the mounting hardware. The only problem I have with this product is the aluminum marker tray. It doesn't fit very tightly and falls off easily if someone bumps into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my home office and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So glad they can ship this large glass panel ready to install. Very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I measured 3 times before putting the hardware in the walls, and the glass mounted perfectly. I made my own template from the included poster board. This was a great deal. The price doesn't even compare to having to pay a local glass company to make one, bring it out and install it.
customer_reviews.author: BigWoods

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maintain board
customer_reviews.text: I got this board for my 7yr old daughter to replace an old vinyl dry-erase easel she's had for a few years... this instantly became a great investment. It looks neat 'floating' on the wall, doesn't soak up marker oil like most vinyl boards, very easy to clean and it greatly reduces the clutter on the floor. Since we were putting this in a kid's room we made sure it was secured firmly on the wall and that it should be treated much like a window, except that it's okay to draw on it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! and, like someone else noted, well packaged, template easy to follow. I was tempted to purchase a piece of frosted glass and thesethat I've bought and used for hanging a mirror, but there's no way to beat the price: it is tempered glass, which is a bit pricier than average glass and the hardware is far better and more attractive than the clips. So this is economical, as well as elegant! One small nit-pick: it would have been very nice if they had found an elegant solution to storing pens/eraser.
customer_reviews.author: AmznSFgal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and I love it. It looks sleek and modern. Super easy to install (and best if your studs are 16" apart). I'll likely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisGoeller

customer_reviews.title: Nice dry erase glass board
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It is beautiful on my wall. Only wish the mounting holes would have been an even 32" on center for easy stud mounting-I personally didn't want to trust this glass to a little anchor (they're ~33 1/4" apart)-I hit both studs, but it was tight.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kenney

customer_reviews.title: life saver for note taking at home office
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS, NOTE Taker, I have it on my wall at my home office next to me!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Must have glass boards.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered 3 so far and these are the perfect price and size for all our church studies. So Thankful they are clear, sturdy and fits in with all decorations
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Seemed really nice and as described, but wrong product shipped to me.
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice and seemed to be good quality, but the wrong product was shipped to me. Additionally, the dry wall mounts look super cheap. I would suggest trying to get them into studs (at least some of them) then maybe upgrading the anchors. (I am sure they work fine, but I tend to over build those.) The shipping box was destroyed and left on my door step in pieces. by OnTrac shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to replace chalk board
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had a small chalkboard in our kitchen and we decided to upgrade it to make it look a bit more classy. This was the perfect solution. My only suggestion is to buy "liquid chalk" and not typical dry erase markers because its a bit difficult to see on this board.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Modern!
customer_reviews.text: Great board that adds a modern touch to my decorations. The board works amazing and cleans beautifully. When it comes to mounting I suck but the process wasn't too bad and the board is still on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful alternative to a traditional white board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful alternative to a traditional white board. I ended up mounting mine with toggle bolts for extra security (had to get different bolts as the head was a little large for the white board mounts, but that was easy to find in lowes). Now I think my wall would fall down before this fell off the wall. Super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: The board is perfect. Looks elegant (and expensive). Don't get the black one though as you will find it hard to get the right markers.
customer_reviews.author: jackie zhang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functionality
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and love them! They were simple to install, but you need two people because of the size. They are functional and beautiful. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, make sure you get the frosted one
customer_reviews.text: elegant, high quality solid glass. I have a clear and a frosted - the lines are hard to see on the clear, but great on the frosted. Note that is comes with markers, but those are low quality - get better markers (e.g generic expo) and the writing shows up much better
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A much cleaner looking option than your typical dry erase board. Easy to hang and clean. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Koh

customer_reviews.title: Fell off with brackets still intact on the wall after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this board up since 2017 and I loved it. Until today. For no apparent reason it came crashing down. The brackets are still securely on the wall. Thank goodness so one was in the room when it did. It made a huge mess and shattered all over my desk and floor. I have photos but I’m not sure how to upload them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The glass is adequately thick but not super thick. This glas does not support magnetic accessories
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few units in this size. They are well made and relatively inexpensive. The glass is frosted and you have to be sure to put the frost on the rear. They supply a few extra parts - can be helpful. The glass is adequately thick but not super thick. This glas does not support magnetic accessories. Very good vale.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Obviously there's a high potential for breakage...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4, 50% arrived intact. They seem to be packaged well enough to withstand light mishandlings, but only 2 of mine made it safely on the voyage. Be careful when ordering, know there's a possibility for breaks. All in all, the glass that made the trip look elegant and function well!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Love this whiteboard!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a whiteboard for my kitchen but wanted something that was more modern looking and well, prettier than your average whiteboard. This is perfect! I love the look of the frosted glass and how sturdy it feels. Mounting- the full size template made this super easy. I wasn't too excited about the drywall fasteners that were included so I used a sturdier one. But installation was quite simple and I was able to do it solo.
customer_reviews.author: JessyVa

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day, has become an essential part of my organization
customer_reviews.text: I cant get by without this, a must have for anyone needing more in your face organizational skils than just a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an absolutely amazing board. When has anyone come in your office and said WOW about a dry erase board. Sleak, uber modern. High quality and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: COMMDEV O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for organization and declaration purpose. Easy to clean and looks way better than the white board. Easy to install! Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: lil Green guy is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled our office and decided to install a dry erase board, but we didn't want to have a giant white thing hanging on the wall. This clear glass model was the perfect solution. Installation was super easy with the included template and I was able to get it hung by myself in about a half an hour. So far we have been very pleased with the look and performance. Just be sure that the wall you are hanging it on is not too dark of a color, otherwise it might be difficult to read what you write.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to install but I really love the purchase. It was a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Puts the standard 'white board' to shame...sleek and clean looking. We chose the clear glass to let the wall color show through and it is perfect. Wipes completely clean without any 'ghost shadows' like standard white boards.
customer_reviews.author: lisamcb

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful addition to our office!!!
customer_reviews.text: We made do with the template provided, a level, & a couple of men. Took about 30 minutes. We haven't had issues with shadows either (as we read about others having & as can be plainly seen on the right side & edges of the product's picture), but our walls are a mid-blue. Shipping was speedy but box slightly damaged, I fully expected to return it but the board was unharmed & in perfect condition. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: W2000

customer_reviews.title: It was quite popular at work.
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for my wife at her office. When the other people in her office saw it 5 more of the boards were purchased.. In this case actions definitely speak louder than words.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Classy Board
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an old-style white board suffering from "ghost markings," as part of our laundry room remodel. This board is very classy. We added a white poster board backing to improve visibility, along with using neon markers, since we have dark wallpaper behind the board.
customer_reviews.author: The Dirt Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Make sure that the magnets that they recommend with order are not too small. Order bigger ones(dime size). I ended up tossing the mini ones. Magnets go behind glass and on top of glass to hold things/papers up. Not just the one magnet. Decent product though.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and exactly how I pictured! Looks even better in person. Great with black walls!
customer_reviews.author: NSS

customer_reviews.title: Not Magnetic! Smudges...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that this board is not magnetic. Be careful before purchasing! I already have it installed, so can't return it :(. It also smudges very easily. Lots of finger prints.
customer_reviews.author: Cville

customer_reviews.title: Looks elegant just as shown, damaged tray.  Though the marker  tray came damaged..
customer_reviews.text: We just opened and hung it today, after a week in garage. It looks really great. The marker tray was slightly damaged and can not slide it. Hope you can send another so I can start using the board ASAP.. it’s too bad there is no option in Amzn menu to send msg to the vendor/support , so I was force to process a return and write a review.
customer_reviews.author: Neeta G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice White Board
customer_reviews.text: This board generally looks good and works well. It takes some skill to get the standoffs in just the right place and each looking straight. There is definitely a green tint to the glass. And while the front surface feels smooth to the touch, using dry erase markers it feels rougher than our other glass boards.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: A white board that actually looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: We turned our dining room into a home office. We needed a white board but most looks tacky. This is nice, super easy to hang although we used different wall anchors for addition support.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome, template easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy mounting. "Create your own template" method whereby you place it on a piece of cardboard and draw the holes actually worked quite well. Just make sure you are very accurate when drilling... don't let the drill slip in any direction... put some direct weight directly behind the drill to ensure you are going straight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: installation with a friend was easy. Glad I went for the biggest one
customer_reviews.text: I've always used whiteboards. I value the opportunity to visualize mental output. I've long wanted a sleek glass board. Although initially concerned by some of the reviews on installation difficulty, it wasn't hard. To ensure success, use a level, do it carefully with common sense and the hardware it comes with. It arrived flawless, installation with a friend was easy. Glad I went for the biggest one. This piece is stunning; writing on it is a pleasure. It holds thoughts beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander
